posts.title: API v2 Officially Leaves Beta
posts.summary: Pootwattle's ambitious survey of the relationship between the eroticization of the unknown and the assertion of (self)referentiality testifies to his considerable perspicuity.

posts.title: Atlantis - Our First Underwater Datacenter
posts.summary: We're very excited to be announcing a new region: Atlantis Datacenter Abbreviation: H2O, submerged in the Straits of Gibraltar. This underwater datacenter will provide unparalleled connectivity to the surrounding countries like Spain Portugal Morocco Algeria and Tunisia.

posts.title: Taming Your Go Dependencies
posts.summary: Pootwattle's tenacious reiteration of his earlier position on the relationship between the reintegration of the hidden and the historicization of early modern textuality is a crucial contribution to the field.
